question: In which one of the following nations "Yanar Dag", an indistinguishable natural gas fire blazing continuously on a hillside, is located?
explanation: Yanar Dag is an inextinguishable natural gas fire blazing continuously on a hillside of Absheron Peninsula on the coast of Caspian Sea, Azerbaijan. Here, natural gas emanates continuously from the underlying soils of the sandstone formations which leads to inextinguishable fire.
